name: Polaris 03
description:
In a near future, your space shuttle crashed in the middle of Antarctica. You are unharmed but your spaceship is shattered. In order to survive, you will have to explore the depth of an odd structure, nearby the crash site...

Genre: science fiction, puzzle, collaborative project with varied gameplay
Languages: English & French
Game length: minimum of approximately 2 hours
Engine: RPG Maker XP
Graphics and music: homemade

Keyboard entries to know:
Enter or Space or C: confirm
X or Echap or 0 (numeric keypad): cancel
F12: back to title screen
Alt+Enter : toggle full screen mode
The game will need using these keys: A, Z, Q or W (QWERTY keyboard
